scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis introduces her companion book, Al-chan, and shows off its back cover.
Ina provides a tour of her 3D studio, highlighting her bookshelf, couch, streaming desk, and the garden view.
Ina expresses her excitement about the 3D showcase and prepares to reveal a secret she has kept for two years.
Ina reveals her tentacles, which she calls 'Ina-boinboins,' and demonstrates their physics and summoning gate.
Ina receives a notification on her streaming monitor and discovers a challenge from the other HoloMyth members.
Takanashi Kiara appears in a video message to congratulate Ina and present her first posing challenge.

subtitles.original: このネクロノミコンがすごい！ 1st
subtitles.english: This Necronomicon is Amazing! 1st

subtitles.original: Al-chan...
subtitles.english: Al-chan...

subtitles.original: ...in the flesh.
subtitles.english: ...in the flesh.

subtitles.original: Al-chan's sleeping right now but I guess...
subtitles.english: Al-chan's sleeping right now but I guess...

subtitles.original: ...you heard of Ina's back, how about Al-chan's back?
subtitles.english: ...you heard of Ina's back, how about Al-chan's back?

subtitles.original: TVドラマ化決定！！
subtitles.english: TV Drama Adaptation Confirmed!!

subtitles.original: I guess you don't really see Al-chan's back that often, hey?
subtitles.english: I guess you don't really see Al-chan's back that often, hey?

subtitles.original: But apparently the TV drama has been decided on but...
subtitles.english: But apparently the TV drama has been decided on but...

subtitles.original: ...you know, I think it's still in the works.
subtitles.english: ...you know, I think it's still in the works.

subtitles.original: But yeah, this is Al-chan.
subtitles.english: But yeah, this is Al-chan.

subtitles.original: And I guess you can look around the rest of the room.
subtitles.english: And I guess you can look around the rest of the room.

subtitles.original: Well, here's my little bookshelf area. It's not full of books yet but...
subtitles.english: Well, here's my little bookshelf area. It's not full of books yet but...

subtitles.original: ...there's a couch over there I usually like to sleep on, you know, I sleep everywhere.
subtitles.english: ...there's a couch over there I usually like to sleep on, you know, I sleep everywhere.

subtitles.original: And yeah, some miscellaneous things and of course, can't forget...
subtitles.english: And yeah, some miscellaneous things and of course, can't forget...

subtitles.original: ...my streaming desk.
subtitles.english: ...my streaming desk.

subtitles.original: That's right, I stream from here, you know, I go...
subtitles.english: That's right, I stream from here, you know, I go...

subtitles.original: Tututututu...
subtitles.english: Tututututu...

subtitles.original: Hi guys!
subtitles.english: Hi guys!

subtitles.original: And you guys see, see the, you know, the view behind me. Yeah, yeah.
subtitles.english: And you guys see, see the, you know, the view behind me. Yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: And then if we walk over a little more this way, you get to see...
subtitles.english: And then if we walk over a little more this way, you get to see...

subtitles.original: ...more books! I love books.
subtitles.english: ...more books! I love books.

subtitles.original: But then there's like a beautiful garden out there, you guys don't really get to see this often, right? Yeah.
subtitles.english: But then there's like a beautiful garden out there, you guys don't really get to see this often, right? Yeah.

subtitles.original: And of course, can't forget this angle of the room...
subtitles.english: And of course, can't forget this angle of the room...

subtitles.original: ...which you guys are very familiar with. Yay!
subtitles.english: ...which you guys are very familiar with. Yay!

subtitles.original: This is my little studio. What do you guys think? Isn't it great? Yeah.
subtitles.english: This is my little studio. What do you guys think? Isn't it great? Yeah.

subtitles.original: So exciting!
subtitles.english: So exciting!

subtitles.original: Yeah, you know, I really want to show you guys, you know, this full space and...
subtitles.english: Yeah, you know, I really want to show you guys, you know, this full space and...

subtitles.original: ...finally after what, two, two and a half, maybe two and a half, two years ish? Yeah.
subtitles.english: ...finally after what, two, two and a half, maybe two and a half, two years ish? Yeah.

subtitles.original: Um, yeah, I'm so, so happy.
subtitles.english: Um, yeah, I'm so, so happy.

subtitles.original: I'm losing my vocabulary here because I'm so, so nervous and happy and...
subtitles.english: I'm losing my vocabulary here because I'm so, so nervous and happy and...

subtitles.original: ...just flooded with emotions.
subtitles.english: ...just flooded with emotions.

subtitles.original: But I guess there's one thing you guys have been looking forward to when it comes to 3D streams, so...
subtitles.english: But I guess there's one thing you guys have been looking forward to when it comes to 3D streams, so...

subtitles.original: ...something I haven't shown you guys yet.
subtitles.english: ...something I haven't shown you guys yet.

subtitles.original: I mean, I've appeared in lives, I've appeared in different shows and programs in my 3D.
subtitles.english: I mean, I've appeared in lives, I've appeared in different shows and programs in my 3D.

subtitles.original: There's one thing, one thing I've asked to be kept secret until today.
subtitles.english: There's one thing, one thing I've asked to be kept secret until today.

subtitles.original: What do you think it is? What could it be?
subtitles.english: What do you think it is? What could it be?

subtitles.original: That's right! My tentacles. Ina-boinboins.
subtitles.english: That's right! My tentacles. Ina-boinboins.

subtitles.original: But you know, it's a little, just a little embarrassing so look away...
subtitles.english: But you know, it's a little, just a little embarrassing so look away...

subtitles.original: ...maybe look away a little bit. Just look away a little bit. Okay.
subtitles.english: ...maybe look away a little bit. Just look away a little bit. Okay.

subtitles.original: Are you guys ready? Wait. Doon! Tada! Ina-boinboin!
subtitles.english: Are you guys ready? Wait. Doon! Tada! Ina-boinboin!

subtitles.original: Ina-boinboin! That's right, I told you guys, it's not...
subtitles.english: Ina-boinboin! That's right, I told you guys, it's not...

subtitles.original: ...it's not attached to my back, there's like a void gate in there somewhere that they're summoned from, but boinboin!
subtitles.english: ...it's not attached to my back, there's like a void gate in there somewhere that they're summoned from, but boinboin!

subtitles.original: I take so... I'm going to touch them. Don't you just want to squeeze them? You can't.
subtitles.english: I take so... I'm going to touch them. Don't you just want to squeeze them? You can't.

subtitles.original: But they're boinboin! Wee!
subtitles.english: But they're boinboin! Wee!

subtitles.original: Boinboin boinboin boinboin boinboin boinboin!
subtitles.english: Boinboin boinboin boinboin boinboin boinboin!

subtitles.original: Okay, calm down Ina, calm down. It'll be okay.
subtitles.english: Okay, calm down Ina, calm down. It'll be okay.

subtitles.original: Hmm, what do you guys think? Yay!
subtitles.english: Hmm, what do you guys think? Yay!

subtitles.original: Oh? I got a call? Ah, tentacles, you're kind of in the way. Okay, look away for a second.
subtitles.english: Oh? I got a call? Ah, tentacles, you're kind of in the way. Okay, look away for a second.

subtitles.original: Look away for a second. Poi! Are they gone? Okay, we good.
subtitles.english: Look away for a second. Poi! Are they gone? Okay, we good.

subtitles.original: CHALLENGE
subtitles.english: CHALLENGE

subtitles.original: We got a message from Myth! Oh my goodness!
subtitles.english: We got a message from Myth! Oh my goodness!

subtitles.original: A challenge! Hmm, what could they have cooked up for me?
subtitles.english: A challenge! Hmm, what could they have cooked up for me?

subtitles.original: Well, they sent some messages for me, so let's see, let's see what they have.
subtitles.english: Well, they sent some messages for me, so let's see, let's see what they have.

subtitles.original: Okay, start with Kiara. Pop pop pop!
subtitles.english: Okay, start with Kiara. Pop pop pop!

subtitles.original: Uwa! Oh, Kikiriki! Hello everybody, this is Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English Myth!
subtitles.english: Uwa! Oh, Kikiriki! Hello everybody, this is Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English Myth!

subtitles.original: Hi Kiara! Your gen-mate. First of all, congratulations on being number one for the range!
subtitles.english: Hi Kiara! Your gen-mate. First of all, congratulations on being number one for the range!

subtitles.original: Thank you! So case, let's go! I'm doing fine right now. No, hopefully. I'm scared.
subtitles.english: Thank you! So case, let's go! I'm doing fine right now. No, hopefully. I'm scared.

subtitles.original: Well, I am here to request a pose or two from you. Okay. So let me start...
subtitles.english: Well, I am here to request a pose or two from you. Okay. So let me start...

subtitles.original: I want two things. Let me start with I want your best or your cutest idol pose that you can think of in 5 seconds.
subtitles.english: I want two things. Let me start with I want your best or your cutest idol pose that you can think of in 5 seconds.

subtitles.original: Idol pose, idol pose! I'll give you 5 seconds to think. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, go!
subtitles.english: Idol pose, idol pose! I'll give you 5 seconds to think. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, go!

subtitles.original: Cute! Jeez! Oh, cute! Okay, okay, here we go again.
subtitles.english: Cute! Jeez! Oh, cute! Okay, okay, here we go again.

subtitles.original: Next one! Next one's next! Okay, okay, okay, next one next. お客みなさん、上から目線でお願いします。
subtitles.english: Next one! Next one's next! Okay, okay, okay, next one's next. Everyone, please look from a top-down perspective.

subtitles.original: イナちゃんは下の方に。
subtitles.english: Ina-chan, please be at the bottom.
